summary: This mod will change player dialogue when guards try to arrest you. Also works for bards
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes player dialogue when guards try to arrest you and when making requests for bards
to more friendly and respectful ones. Like adding please to what your character says. Some dialogue weren't changed since some are already friendly

I also have an alternative to this mod which adds mean player dialogue-http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53371/?

Known Bugs

1.This mod WILL conflict with my mean dialogue mod or other mods that change dialogue for guards and bards, so you shouldn't have 2 installed at the same time.
It will cause longer loading screens and it might (not yet confirmed) cause an infinite loading screen. If you have 2 completely different player dialogue mods, whichever is first than the other in the loading order is what you will see.
author: DiscordLol
